They watch your stories Admit
it When you have a crush on

their stories, posts

Well, the same goes

for them If someone is always

means they're genuinely
interested in what you're up to
and want to know more about your day-

today life even the little
things And if they consistently

for you They consistently

This is a huge one If someone

They tag you

someone someone frequently tags

trying to build a connection

with your old posts If
